description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol this month to hear all about Forking processes! If you have a talk or lightning talk you want to share let us know too.

Expect another Ruby packed evening with plenty of conversation, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:00 - 19:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees

19:10 - "Fork it: managing processes and parallelising tasks in Ruby" by RedFred

19:40 - We aim to wrap all the talks up by 19:40pm but there is still time for another drink, some more food and discussion with fellow attendees

Slack

If you'd like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

Notices

Please let us know in the comments of the event if you have any specific food allergies, dietary or access requirements so we can be sure to best accommodate everyone!
title: South West Ruby #22
